post.body: thanks 4 letting me know!!! Bummer. Trying to get it sorted but google is way slow!!
oh no ....did u get some time to go out and enjoy the snow??
mgd some time at the beach 2day. V busy week ahead at work.
wish I was at the cricket. Will have to do with watching it at home on telly

Nadolig Llawen to all!!!
Driving thru London and it's like a ghost town. Quiet as. Happy Christmas everyone!
Pretty sleepy
Off to the land of sheep, castles, rain and doctor who
Off to the midlands. Looking forward to train journey
Stressed during a holiday. Sigh
In desperate need to get out
Hoping to pop down to pub to watch spurs v utd ltr. V blustery n cold. Fortunately no floods like in d south- west
Losing track of time, very freeing!
At camden, v fun, too good
Good to be back in london
Off to play golf wif dad at JB
